title: Web Components: Frontend / Backend / Database / Hosting
description: Understanding the different components that make up a web application

blocks.content: 1.2 網頁的組成：前端 / 後端 / 資料庫 / Hosting (Web Components: Frontend / Backend / Database / Hosting)
Learn about the four main components that make up modern web applications.
The user interface that users interact with directly in their browsers.
The server-side logic that processes requests and manages data.
Where your application's data is stored and managed.
Where your web application lives on the internet.
